entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9605] It is expected that OtherReserves with a value of 30,200,000 reported in the network role http://www.hudbayminerals.com/role/BalanceSheet should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember and a reported value of 61,300,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.hudbayminerals.com/role/StockholdersEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherReserves fact are:
Period : 2023-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of OtherReserves : -5 Decimals of Equity : -5 Rule version: 26.0.9 - exhibit99-2.htm 8233

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9605] It is expected that OtherReserves with a value of 14,300,000 reported in the network role http://www.hudbayminerals.com/role/BalanceSheet should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember and a reported value of 61,500,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.hudbayminerals.com/role/StockholdersEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherReserves fact are:
Period : 2024-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of OtherReserves : -5 Decimals of Equity : -5 Rule version: 26.0.9 - exhibit99-2.htm 8230
